body: This ain’t even that bad, I’ve seen worse. Much worse.

Until you see he blowing Naruto under his desk while Sasuke comes in to give a report and is clueless on what is going on.

Hinata should start fucking Sasuke somehow against her will, perhaps out of loneliness or to help her family somehow, but she slowly would start feeling it. In the end she would either leave her family to follow her newfound desires, or she would stay with her family, but still fucking Sasuke tima and again.
